author: tkormann
msg: add the renderingClone method that might be used later.
This method creates a deep clone of a GVT tree but shares the various
After some benchs, it's much faster to clone the whole GVT tree rather
than rendering the tree. So the renderer and the scripting module will share
a LOCK just between the modification and the cloning process.
Just a first idea to explore.

author: tkormann
msg: small patch to improve GVT rendering (30% faster :)

author: billh
msg: Patch to resolve relative font weights that gives "intended" resutls
bold fonts (>500) and resolves "bolder" to 600 for non-bold fonts (<=500).
This matches our weight tagging in the SVGTextElementBridge, since
we don't now use intermediate-boldness tags like ULTRABOLD, DEMIBOLD.
(Though Java defines these weights, they don't work with standard fonts).
NOTE: Relative font weight resolution should eventually move to the
